job.title: Data Scientist / Computer Vision  ALGORITHM RESEARCHER for our US office
job.description:
Vision Elements is looking to hire an experienced Freelance Algorithm Researcher in the fields of computer vision / deep learning.

 

American or Canadian candidates are invited to apply and join a professional and experienced group. Be part of fascinating projects and overcome exciting challenges.

Our projects are diverse, in many sectors, combining teamwork with independent work.

 

We are looking for an experienced and independent freelance algorithm researcher to lead our growing activity in the US. Work can take place remotely from the convenience of your home.

 

Required:

·        MSc / PhD / Postdoc in Physics, Mathematics, Electrical Engineering or Computer Sciences

·        Experience in computer vision / data science

·        Experience in as many of the following:

3D reconstruction algorithm development ; parameter estimation; inverse problems techniques: Graph Theory; Optimization; Deep learning; GPGPU: Medical Imaging

·        Thorough skill in MATLAB / Python

·        High proficiency in C++

·        Good communication skills (written and verbal)

·       Independent and likes challenges

 

Employment Type

Full-time
